titles.title: To extend the authority of the Federal Communications Commission to use competitive bidding in granting licenses and permits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Commerce. H. Rept. 104-88.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 42.

bill.summary: 3/13/1995--Introduced. Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to extend through FY 2000 the authority of the Federal Communications Commission to use competitive bidding in granting licenses and permits.
